attributes.action: Intorduce the proposed ".xxx" gTLD (Generic Top Level Domain)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A gTLD (generic top-level domain) for sexually explicit material was proposed as one tool for dealing with the conflict between those who wish to provide and access such material through the Internet, and those who wish to prevent access to it, either by children and adolescents, or by employees at their workplaces.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
False or incomplete name or address information
